text:
[Verse]
Lights are flashing hearts collide
On the dance floor side by side
Feel the rhythm take control
Let the music heal your soul

[Verse 2]
Moonlight glowing in the night
Stars are shining feeling right
Move together step by step
In this magic no regret

[Chorus]
Dancing on the edge tonight
Underneath the neon light
Together we ignite the flame
In this dance we'll stay the same

[Verse 3]
Whispers softly in my ear
Melodies that we both hear
Every beat a heartbeat shared
In this moment nothing's spared

[Verse 4]
Feet are moving spins and twirls
Lost in music like a whirl
Heartbeat racing time stands still
Feel the magic sense the thrill

[Chorus]
Dancing on the edge tonight
Underneath the neon light
Together we ignite the flame
In this dance we'll stay the same
title: Dancing on the Edge
